sentences.en: A prince turns into a frog in this cartoon fairytale.
sentences.cn: 在这个卡通童话里王子变成了一只青蛙。

sentences.en: After a whirlwind courtship and a fairytale wedding the couple had settled down to an urban lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 在一段旋风般的热恋和一个童话式的婚礼之后，夫妻俩定居下来，过起了都市生活。

sentences.en: Again the Burton - Depp combo – Depp's performance in Burton's fairytale – has proved a huge success.
sentences.cn: 德普的演技加上波顿的童话,这次强强联手再获巨大的成功.

sentences.en: An unhappy duckling grows into a beautiful swan in this magical fairytale.
sentences.cn: 一只丑小鸭经历了种种凄苦的遭遇,最后变成一只美丽的天鹅!

sentences.en: And that's why Havant and Waterlooville are this year's fairytale story.
sentences.cn: 这就是哈万特是本年度神话的原因所在.

sentences.en: Disappeared at sunrise, seemed only a fairytale.
sentences.cn: 在日出前消褪, 像一则童话般唯美.

sentences.en: Feeling that we had intruded on a fairytale scene, we drove back to the hotel.
sentences.cn: 正当觉得闯入了童话般场景时, 我们驱车返回酒店.

sentences.en: IT was the test that could have ruined Mary Donaldson's fairytale romance with Denmark's Prince Frederik.
sentences.cn: 这是测试,可能毁掉玛丽唐纳森的童话般的浪漫与丹麦王储弗雷德里克.

sentences.en: My fairytale is a nick name of the reality.
sentences.cn: 过一阵就好.应该是什么事放不开吧.

sentences.en: Now I know you're not a fairytale and dreams were meant for sleeping.
sentences.cn: 现在我终于知道你不是我的童话,你只是我睡梦中的梦境.

sentences.en: Oh I forgot... .this is just a fairytale!
sentences.cn: 哦，我忘了... 这仅仅是一个童话故事！

sentences.en: She loved him so much: it was a fairytale romance.
sentences.cn: 她深深爱着他：这是个童话般的浪漫故事。

sentences.en: That was sold as a fairytale wedding, but from the point of view of most of the public, it turned out to be one of those fairytales that don't have a happy ending.
sentences.cn: 那是当作童话式的婚礼推销的，但是从对大部分市民的角度来看，它最终是变成了那些没有幸福结局的童话故事之一。

sentences.en: This fairytale city is equal parts European sophistication, stunning scenery and romance.
sentences.cn: 这座童话般的城市将欧洲的古老传统 、 迷人景色和浪漫气息集于一身.

sentences.en: This kind of love is temporary andonly as the fairytale lasts.
sentences.cn: 这种爱就像童话故事一样短暂.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, life is not a fairytale a happy ending.
sentences.cn: 可惜, 现实生活没童话般的美好.

sentences.en: You have negative thoughts , and you look for romantic love like in a fairytale.
sentences.cn: 你常祈望你的爱情像童话故事一样美丽和完美.

trans.tran_cn: 童话式的，童话中才有的，优美无比的
